channel.title: [317]how to open doors[317]
channel.description: i need to know a code to leave the doors open and where i should put the code at

item.title: [317]how to open doors[317]
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

[quote=“The Soul, post:3, topic:260072”]ReplaceObject(x, y, id, face);[/quote]Yeah, but he wants them to open and stay open for everyone.

You’re going to have to set up a boolean in playerHandler. Set it to false at first, then you’re going to have to go into you’re client.java and add a reference to the method and when you click the object it returns true. Then, you’r going to have to make an if statment saying “if (doorOpen == true) { ReplaceObject(x, y, id, face);”.

That way it will use playerHandler to effect all the players rather than just you. It also stays open when you log off, considering it’s open through playHandler and not the client class.

The only problem is, you’re going to have to find out how to set this for every door you open. And considering not all doors are at the same face, you’re going to have trouble figuring out how to do this.

Read full topic
